name: SCP 2014 Classic
description:
Just the modern webgl version of this: https://www.furaffinity.net/view/15311869/ & this: https://www.furaffinity.net/view/14894578/

Please note that not all the old scripts survived the port from Unity 4 to 2019. Mostly just enemy movement stuff and some cut-scene dialogue and timing from getting captured by NMM.
